data.name: RPG Maker MV - Heaven and Earth Music Pack
data.detailed_description:
From the lone Tibetan monk standing atop the misty mountain peak to the mysterious ninja racing across the village rooftops, the mystical element invoked by the melody of the traditional Chinese violin called the Erhu (Japanese Niko) is a true treat for the listener's ears.

Heaven and Earth, composed by Murray Atkinson from VGM Library, features masterful compositions in collaboration with Otori Ayaka - a Niko player from Japan. With 12 BGM themes and 36 ME sounds, this audio bundle is a great addition to modern and classic fantasy games alike. Blending tradition with modern instrumentation, Heaven and Earth is a cinematic-quality experience that will enchant the developer and the player alike.

Features:

  • 12 BGM themes.
  • 36 ME themes.
  • Authentic instruments and original composition.
  • .M4A, .OGG and .MP3 formats included.
  • Tested in and formatted for RPG Maker MV.

Check out our other Music Packs created by Murray Atkinson:

Wonderland Music Pack
Medieval Warfare Music Pack
The Agency Music Pack
Rebel Rapture Music Pack
Epic Strings Music Pack
Heist Music Pack
Emporium of Copper and Steel Music Pack
Sinister Hollows Music Pack
Classic Fantasy Music Pack
Spanish Guitar Strings

store.steampowered.com/app/653891/RPG_Maker_VX_Ace__Heaven_and_Earth_Music_Pack/

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
